channel.title: Arma 3: Altis Life
channel.description:
This is a RPG mod for Arma 3 which attempts to mimic irl to an extent. There's civilians, cops and medics. Voice chat is used to communicate between close-ranged players and keeping in role play is a must in the majority of servers. Great to play with a group of friends
http://www.gaming-asylum.com/features/#
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W_JgV10Fir4[/youtube]
[img]http://s20.postimg.org/py8l9ypp9/marker.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PQt8Po2.jpg[/img]
Media is taken from the forums of the server that I play, credits to whoever they belong to.

I think the best game category is RPG, so I love this game.
